message.markdown: A JWT decode() method is used that decodes the token but does not check its validity or integrity. If the JWT has originated from an untrusted source, decoded data could be crafted by an attacker and should not be considered safe to use or process within the application. Always use JWT verification methods to validate the structure and integrity of a token.
message.text: A JWT decode() method is used that decodes the token but does not check its validity or integrity. If the JWT has originated from an untrusted source, decoded data could be crafted by an attacker and should not be considered safe to use or process within the application. Always use JWT verification methods to validate the structure and integrity of a token.
